reference: Barro, R.J. (2000). Inequality and Growth in a Panel of Countries, Journal of Economic Growth, March.
Barro, R.J. (1997). Determinants of Economic Growth: A Cross-Country Empirical Study, Cambridge MA, MIT Press.
Caprio, G. and D. Klingebiel (1996). Bank Insolvencies: Cross-Country Experience, Policy Research Working Paper number 1620, Washington DC, The World Bank.
Demirguc-Kunt, A. and E. Detragiache (1997). The Determinants of Banking Crises: Evidence from Developed and Developing Countries, unpublished, International Monetary Fund, May.

Eichengreen, B. and A.K. Rose (1998). Staying Afloat when the Wind Shifts: External Factors and Emerging-Market Banking Crises, National Bureau of Economic Research, working paper number 6370, January.
Frankel, J.A. and A.K. Rose (1996). Currency Crashes in Emerging Markets: An Empirical Treatment, Journal of International Economics.
Glick, R. and M. Hutchison (1999). Banking and Currency Crises: How Common Are Twins'DONE' unpublished, University of California Santa Cruz, September.
Park, Y.C. and J.W. Lee (2001). Recovery and Sustainability in East Asia, unpublished, Korea University, March.
